author: J. David Holcomb
title: Famed New York Face and Body Specialist Lawrence S. Glassman, M.D. Joins Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa
text:
Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa, PLLC (“Holcomb – Kreithen”), one of the leading plastic surgery practices in Florida, is pleased to welcome Lawrence S. Glassman, M.D., a board-certified plastic surgeon (face, breast, body), to its growing practice. The addition of famed Dr. Glassman brings enhanced national recognition and plastic surgery experience to Holcomb – Kreithen. Adding to the practice founders, J. David Holcomb, M.D. and Joshua Kreithen, M.D., the three surgeons are confident that together they will continue to provide top-rated aesthetic treatments to even more members of the Sarasota-area community and beyond.
Dr. J. David Holcomb said, “We are excited to have a surgeon of Larry Glassman’s caliber and celebrity join our team. He represents the attributes everyone in our practice strives to attain on a daily basis – skill, compassion, safety and a focus on helping people look their best.”
Dr. Glassman received national and international attention for performing tummy tuck surgery on Kate Gosselin, the mother of sextuplets and star of the TLC reality show Jon & Kate Plus 8. The procedure was filmed for the Discovery network special Sextuplets and Twins: One Year Later.
He states, “It’s an honor for me to join Drs. Holcomb and Kreithen and their professional team. I look forward to helping grow their already-successful practice further, and having a positive impact on as many people as possible.” According to Dr. Glassman, “The goal of plastic surgery is to enhance a patient’s appearance in a natural way. Patients want to look better, not different.”
Dr. Glassman will be joining the practice in time to participate in the upcoming Holcomb – Kreithen “Plastic Surgery University” Event being held at the Mall at University Town Center (UTC) on October 24, 2015. The event will consist of an interactive educational series of mini seminars covering aesthetic and plastic surgery options that can help people look their best.
Dr. Glassman’s expertise encompasses over 30 years of surgical experience and covers facial procedures, breast and body contouring and reconstructive surgery. A member of the American Society of Plastic Surgeons and the American Society for Aesthetic Plastic Surgery, he brings extensive knowledge and skills from the top hospitals and institutions in the country, including Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine, Columbia Presbyterian Hospital, and Montefiore Medical Center. He is also the founder of Glassman Plastic Surgery of Pomona, N.Y.
Dr. Glassman plays an active role in teaching plastic surgeons the advanced techniques of Aesthetic and Reconstructive Plastic Surgery. He is an Assistant Clinical Professor of Plastic Surgery at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine in New York. Notably, he is an author and chairperson of the Cosmetic and Breast Committee of the Plastic Surgery In-Service Examination that is taken yearly by all young plastic surgeons in the country.
To schedule a consultation with Dr. Glassman, please call 941-365-8679.
About Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa
Located in beautiful downtown Sarasota, Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa offers a comprehensive range of aesthetic surgical and non-surgical treatments that enhance the lives of men and women. The founding physicians of the practice include J. David Holcomb, M.D. (Facial Plastic and Cosmetic Laser Surgeon) and Joshua Kreithen, M.D. (Breast and Body Contouring Specialist). An Aesthetic and Wellness Medicine specialist, Dr. Andrea Kreithen, is available to help patients refine their appearance and optimize their inner physical well-being and health.
Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa is renowned for its expertise in facial plastic surgery, plastic surgery of the breasts and body, cosmetic laser surgery and aesthetic skin care. The AAAASF-accredited facility includes a private outpatient ambulatory surgical center. With its advanced laser center, the MedSpa offers numerous options for skin rejuvenation and minimally-invasive and non-surgical contouring of the face and body.
The Holcomb – Kreithen Plastic Surgery and MedSpa staff is comprised of an extraordinary group of professionals whose primary goal is to safely empower individuals to reach their full potential. They are committed to treating patients and each other with kindness, compassion and dignity at all times. For more information, visit http://www.sarasota-med.com .
